edu.iu.harp.resource

Class Writable

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.harp.resource.Transferable
      • edu.iu.harp.resource.Simple
        • edu.iu.harp.resource.Writable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ack, Barrier, Join, Key, KVPartition, PartitionCount, PartitionSet, Value

    public abstract class Writable
extends Simple
    ByteArray class for managing writable objects.
